dict.string: Verify and/or set DND__kmfamResourcesFolderPath, loop until valid or canceled
Tell the user we need them to locate the Resources Folder for us.
You need to specify the location of the Resources Folder "KMFAM Resources". Please click "OK", and locate the Resources Folder.
Have the user pick the Resources Folder
tell application (path to frontmost application as text) set dir to POSIX path of (choose folder with prompt "Please locate the folder 'KMFAM Resources'") end tell

dict.string: The prefs folder is in the "prefs" subfolder of the Resources folder.
Create a new Preferences Folder if needed
